title: "Samsung Introduces Game Changing Exynos 2200 Processor with Xclipse GPU Powered by AMD RDNA 2 Architecture"
excerpt: "Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd., a world leader in advanced semiconductor technology, today announced its new premium mobile processor, the Exynos 2200. The Exynos 2200 is a freshly designed mobile processor with a powerful AMD RDNA 2 architecture based Samsung Xclipse graphics processing unit (GPU)."
